displayName: GitDiff BC - Beyond Compare Git Diff Tool
description: Quickly compare files/folders with Git history using Beyond Compare
configuration.title: Beyond Compare Git
configuration.executablePath.description:
Custom path to Beyond Compare executable. Leave empty for auto-detection.

**Examples**:
- Windows: `C:\Program Files\Beyond Compare 4\BCompare.exe`
- macOS: `/Applications/Beyond Compare.app/Contents/MacOS/bcomp`
- Linux: `/usr/bin/bcompare`
configuration.logLevel.description:
Log output level. View logs: Open Output panel and select **Beyond Compare Git** channel.

- `error`: Errors only
- `warn`: Warnings and errors
- `info`: General information (recommended)
- `debug`: Detailed debug information
